ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Psych 504 is a great class for the student who wants to read scientific literature relevant to the study of emotion.
It is a good class and I did learn some neurobio basics, but would have liked more interaction and discussion. So I would recommend it.
I would recommend it as a good course to become familiar with the neural correlates/basis of emotion.
Course involves students presenting assigned readings in depth. I would likely recommend it to someone who needed a broad overview of neurobiology.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course was great because it gave me exposure to other types of research in emotion.
The course gave me food for thought in the realm of my own research, even though it was not directly applicable.
Provided information on the neurobiology of emotion! Helped contribute to research ideas.
